name: Gardevoir Kingdom
startIntroPart1: Glory to you, Beatrice, leader of the Gardevoir kingdom!
startIntroPart2: May your leadership bring progress and enlightenment to these lands and take your kind to the stars!
declaringWar: I'm deeply sorry that we had to resort to violence, but we cannot allow you to disrupt the balance in this world!
attacked: So, this is how it is going to be, very well then!
defeated: M...my people... I... I'm so sorry... I failed you all...
introduction: Greetings Human! my name is Beatrice, leader of the Gardevoir kingdom! I hope we can forge a long lasting frienship!
neutralHello: Welcome Human! I'm glad you came al the way here!
neutralNo: I'm sorry, but we can't accpet that.
hateHello: What brings you in here, Human?
hateNo: There's no way we can accept that!
afterPeace: Very well then, let there be peace once more..
tradeRequest: What do you think of this offer, my friend?
